text:
Here is the present that I was not
able to give you earlier. I really did
want to hand it to you directly, but
delivery with a nice card attached
has its charms too. Do let me know
if you like it! I'm sure you will.

I couldn't give it to you in person
since your pockets were full, but
this is a present from me. Thank
you for waiting so patiently for it.
I don't know if it will live up to your
expectations, but I do hope so.

Thank you again, darling! Here's
that present I couldn't give you
before. I thought about making you
wait a bit to tantalize you, but I
simply couldn't do it. I was so
eager for you to have it right away!
